snippet: Stocks rose after an encouraging report on retail sales. Eight of the 10 industry sectors of the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index rose.
abstract: Markets rise for second consecutive day following encouraging retail sales figures.
lead_paragraph: Stocks rose after an encouraging report on retail sales. Eight of the 10 industry sectors of the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index rose.

headline.main: Report on May Retail Sales Lifts Market
headline.print_headline: Report on May Retail Sales Lifts Market
